channel.title: Back Catalogue on Grant McMaster
channel.description: Recent content in Back Catalogue on Grant McMaster

item.title: Metro 2033: Britannia
item.description: Metro 2033: Britannia Novel · Published 2010 · Currently out of print A licensed novel set in Dmitry Glukhovsky’s post-apocalyptic Metro 2033 universe, exploring what happened to Britain after the bombs fell.

item.title: Whispers
item.description: Whispers Short Story Collection · Available on Amazon A collection of short fiction, led by the title story set in a post-apocalyptic world. Available on Amazon →
